title: Huge Lag, ping spikes, and a random connecting error during loading screen.
body:
Pretty much the tittle, it is completely insane do deal with.
You randomly have a smooth patch of ping, then its Boots into the thousands.
I am able to connect and search my browser and play other games just fine.
But something is wrong here and it isn't on our end. Please riot, if you see this try looking into it,
Maybe its a mac or TPG thing. It is to frustrating for words.

replies.body: Have you tried using a different connection? It might be solely down to TPG on this.
